name: Ghost Sovereign Session
on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '25 14 * * 1-5' # 5 mins before US Open
jobs:
  execute:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'
      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: pip install pandas requests pyyaml
      - name: Run Sentinel Gauntlet
        run: python main_bot.py --autonomous
        env:
          T212_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.T212_API_KEY }}
      - name: Auto-Commit State
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v5
        with:
          commit_message: "v33.40: State Persistence Update [skip ci]"
